channel.title: Favorite Pokemon!?
channel.description: Title is pretty self explanatory, all generations are game! I feel like this forums needs an active thread for one of the greatest gaming franchises of all time! Talk about games, characters, memorabilia, whatever! I would have to say that my favorite Pokemon would be a tie between my original 151 man Charmander and Absol :D As for the game I would choose Ruby.

item.title: Favorite Pokemon!?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

If they really took the time to revamp their system and change the gameplay in a drastic way I might be interested, but it’s still the same city hop, grab badge type gameplay. There really is no incentive to train your team versus one pokémon, there is no point in completing your whole Pokédex, or completing side missions. Pokémon don’t really have a use (besides I think you can ride a couple of them now?) I mean you are better off using an HM slave than utilizing HM moves as attacks. Plus they had gamesharks for 3 generations of games, so we really don’t even know if Pokémon are legit when we’re trading.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Pokemon!?
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Elrick:

The Nintendo hand-helds came out just as often as their Pokémon games. I stopped with the regular DS because I don’t have the cash for that, nor do I have the patience to grind the shit out of those games like I used to.

Totally understandable, I wouldn’t have my 3DS if I didn’t snag it for an amazing deal.

Read full topic

Favorite games: Ruby, Sapphire, and Emerald
Favorite pokemon: Tied between Regi pokemon (Regice, Regigigas, and Regirock), the 3 legendary birds (Zapdos, Articuno, and Moltres), Altaria, Raqquazza, Kyogre.

Speaking of which, Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire announced about a month ago. Super Excited.
[/quote]
But its by November

Plus roms won’t been available for a while too. So ;([/quote]

[font=arial][size=8pt]Well… I already decided what I wanted for my birthday ;p.

Also. This “little” feller is my fav: [/size][/font][spoiler][/spoiler]
[font=arial][size=8pt]Grass types always loved them.[/size][/font]

item.title: Favorite Pokemon!?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Death Style:

iirc i used to buy illegal items and catch shiny pokemon on request just by editing the urls on pokemon world online

I am pretty sure PWO used a client, unless you were hacking or something. There were quite a lot of attempted MMOs for Pokémon. So far PokéMMO seems to be the best, if anyone ever decides to join hit me up with a PM and when I start to get better Pokémon I will try to send some your way.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Pokemon!?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Jumpstarting this discussion again while we’re on about roms…

https://pokemmo.eu/

If you guys are interested in a multiplayer game, I’d recommend this one. Requires you to download the FireRed v1.0 rom, and optionally you can download heartgold/soulsilver rom as well for a better experience. coolrom has both of them, and it has trading, guilds, and chats. Honestly it is very impressive and probably the best one out there, especially seeing as Pokémon World Online just lost it’s lead developer.

Read full topic
